Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: The names of the packages that have just been suspended.
@B_android#os#UserHandle_E@
UserHandle: the user for which the given packages were suspended.
@B_android#os#Bundle_E@
Bundle: A @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ of extras for the launcher, if provided to the system, null otherwise. This value may be null.
onPackagesSuspended(java.lang.String[],a.Description: Indicates that one or more packages have been suspended. A device administrator or an app with android.permission.SUSPEND_APPS can do this. A suspending app with the permission android.permission.SUSPEND_APPS can optionally provide a @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ of extra information that it deems helpful for the launcher to handle the suspended state of these packages. The contents of this @B_android#os#Bundle_E@ are supposed to be a contract between the suspending app and the launcher.
onPackagesSuspended(java.lang.String[],a.FullName: public void onPackagesSuspended (String[] packageNames, UserHandle user, Bundle launcherExtras)

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: The name of the package that was removed.
@B_android#os#UserHandle_E@
UserHandle: The UserHandle of the profile that generated the change.
onPackageRemoved(java.lang.String,androi.Description: Indicates that a package was removed from the specified profile. If a package is removed while being updated onPackageChanged will be called instead.
onPackageRemoved(java.lang.String,androi.FullName: public abstract void onPackageRemoved (String packageName, UserHandle user)

Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: The name of the package that has the shortcuts. This value must never be null.
@B_java#util#List_E@

List: All shortcuts from the package (dynamic, manifest and/or pinned). Only "key" information will be provided, as defined in @B_android#content#pm#ShortcutInfo#hasKeyFieldsOnly_E@. This value must never be null.
@B_android#os#UserHandle_E@
UserHandle: The UserHandle of the profile that generated the change. This value must never be null.
onShortcutsChanged(java.lang.String,java.Description: Indicates that one or more shortcuts of any kind (dynamic, pinned, or manifest) have been added, updated or removed. Only the applications that are allowed to access the shortcut information, as defined in @B_android#content#pm#LauncherApps#hasShortcutHostPermission_E@, will receive it.
onShortcutsChanged(java.lang.String,java.FullName: public void onShortcutsChanged (String packageName, List<ShortcutInfo> shortcuts, UserHandle user)

ClassDesc: Callbacks for package changes to this and related managed profiles.
